title: Easy artichoke pasta salad
ingredients: ['100g macaroni, or other pasta', '1 jar artichoke heart antipasto (in oil)', '50g mushrooms, quartered', '150g cherry tomatoes, halved', '140g pitted black olives', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1/2 teaspoon dried basil', '1/2 tablespoon dried oregano', '2 cloves garlic, minced', 'salt and pepper to taste']
